resources.string: New build of PHP(%1$s) is available, do You want to install it?
Cannot start server - document root directory does not exist

This is totally free and opensource app that works using PHP built-in server and can be started automatically on boot.

PHP(version 5.5.7) has these modules: Core, date, ereg, libxml, openssl, pcre, sqlite3, zlib, bcmath, bz2, calendar, ctype, curl, dom, hash, fileinfo, filter, ftp, gd, gettext, gmp, SPL, iconv, intl, json, mbstring, mcrypt, session, standard, mysqlnd, mysqli, PDO, pdo_mysql, pdo_sqlite, Phar, posix, pspell, recode, Reflection, mysql, SimpleXML, soap, sockets, exif, tidy, tokenizer, wddx, xml, xmlreader, xmlrpc, xmlwriter, xsl, zip, cli_server, mhash, Zend OPcache

Recommended for usage: in development or for very very small websites with very small amount of visitors, couse this server supports only one request at a time.

Server document root by default(it can be changed) is sdcard/www so put files there.

Edit php.ini, extensions.ini as needed, they are loaded from document root directory.

Sorry but standard PHP locales wont work(setlocale and such).

Author

Tautvydas Andrikys
